mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLICKS c JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT pc ON pc.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN CONTENT ct ON ct.ID = pc.CONTENT_ID WHERE ct.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS clickDate, COUNT(*) AS clicks FROM CLICKS c JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT pc ON pc.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN CONTENT ct ON ct.ID = pc.CONTENT_ID WHERE ct.USER_ID = #{userId} AND TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT) ORDER BY TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT)
